title: Nonprofit Unveils A New ‘Detransitioner Bill of Rights’ To Counter The Left's Trans Agenda
description:
The political abuse of science has affected a lot of people since the scamdemic. But one of the most abhorrent forms that has emerged in the last decade is “gender-affirming care.”

This is all fueled by the myth that someone can actually be “born in the wrong body.”

Do No Harm, a national nonprofit committed to safeguarding healthcare from radical ideology announced it has published the “Detransitioner Bill of Rights.”

— (@)

title: Britney Spears Claims She Got An Abortion While Dating Timberlake Because He ‘Didn’t Want To Be A Father’
description:
Britney Spears wrote in her memoir “The Woman In Me” that while she was dating Justin Timberlake, she got an abortion, claiming he “didn’t want to be a father” and that if it had been left up to her, she never would have never killed her own child.

“It was a surprise, but for me, it wasn’t a tragedy,” Spears wrote. “I loved Justin so much. I always expected us to have a family together one day. This would just be much earlier than I’d anticipated.”

title: Watch: Biden Admin Calls For "A Universal System Of Public Health" For Addressing Climate Change
description:
A top Biden official who refuses to use the term “mother” is once again confusing political science with actual science.

Washington Post Live held a conversation regarding "the most pressing challenges to health care and the next generation of innovation in medicine." And to no surprise, Biden HHS Secretary Xavier Becerra took this moment to try and correlate the weather with life expectancy.

Biden HHS Secretary Xavier Becerra

title: Watch: Progressive Tech Billionaires Admit How Good They Had It Under Trump
description:
It is common for the left to attempt to gaslight the American public and say that Trump actually did nothing for the economy and that he inherited it from Obama. But anyone with half a brain knows that is not true and that it was due to Trump's economic policies that created such an amazing economy.

Although it does not take a genius to understand the aforementioned statements, it might actually take a billionaire to figure it out.

A TikTok video circulating social media shows San Francisco billionaires completely changing their minds on Trump, according to the caption.

title: Mexican Cartel Pinky Promises To Bar Fentanyl Production: “Sincerely Yours, The Chapitos.”
description:
The tooth fairy is real, Santa Claus really does deliver presents on Christmas, and a Mexican cartel has promised that they are putting an end to one of its biggest money-makers.

A Mexican drug cartel that was once ruled by the now-jailed Mexican drug lord “El Chapo” has barred the production of fentanyl — under penalty of death.

— (@)

title: Please enjoy watching this climate whacko get plowed into the ground by a nun: "I expected the nuns to be reasonable"
description:
The Lord works in mysterious ways. Elwood Blues taught us that. God knew there is a lot of "everything sucks" and "everything's terrible" and "someone do something" in the news this week. So he delivered onto us a pick me up. A video of a nun tackling a climate wackadoodle and making him her bitch.

That has to be why this video from last year is going viral today. A large Catholic religious center was being built in Saint-Pierre-de-Colombier that the environuts had an issue with. Some carbon footprint bullsh*t. It may have been built since then. All the articles are in French and I only read in American like everyone else should.

title: Watch: We Infiltrated a Pro-Hamas Rally in Dallas
description:
Pro-Palestine protests that have swept the country made their way to Dallas on Saturday, and we were there to see it unfold.

An “All Out for Palestine” protest outside of Dallas City Hall drew over 1,000 attendees. According to the Dallas Morning News, attendees were seen carrying the Palestinian flag or wearing red and green hijabs, and some people sprayed red and green smoke into the crowd as they began marching.

Lane Kendall was at the protest to see where the attendees really stood.

title: 6'1" woman dominates world fencing championship, though of course "she" was born a dude...
description:
71-year-old Liz Kocab has been dominating the veterans' fencing championship for decades, having racked up wins in her 50s and 60s, and now in her 70s. She was going to walk away from the game. But something in every fiber of her womanhood told her to compete one last time.

How does one become so dominant in the senior fencing circuit? Kocab towers over the other competitors, standing at 6 '1". Also, and this may have something to do with it, Liz Kocab is a man. Or, was a man. It all gets so confusing. (h/t Outkick)

— (@)

title: Watch Today's Show: We Infiltrated a Dallas Pro-Hamas Rally! & Can Jim Jordan Actually Become Speaker?!
description:
Former President Donald Trump was issued a gag order in his ongoing federal case over the 2020 Election, we dive into the latest. The House of Representatives will likely vote today on whether or not to confirm Rep. Jim Jordan of OH as Speaker of the House. Also, the pro-Palestine protests that have swept the country made their way to Dallas on Saturday, and we were there to see it unfold. We have exclusive footage.

TRUMP GAGGED

title: Watch: Guy chooses wrong car for TikTok's "Kia Challenge," gets throttled all over the streets of Chicago by the owner
description:
Welcome to Chicago. Home to inferior pizza, what's left of the Bears, and so much crime it makes New York City and Los Angeles look like less of a crime-infested suckhole. With so much crime, it's understandable why someone would think you can break into someone's car and get away with it. And this guy almost did. Only the car owner came back too soon and proceeded to throttle the jacker all over the streets of Chicago. SPOILER: It involves a metal support beam.

This is all alleged, according to the woman who thought to take out her phone and do it for the content. The beatdown remains undeniable.

— (@)

title: Watch: Conservative leader performs MASTER CLASS responding to reporter's journactivism, all while munching an apple
description:
Pierre Poilievre is the conservative alternative to Prime Minster Justin "I Feel Pretty" Trudeau. Maybe. Canada's walking pile of soy and hair goop only gets around 33% of the Canadian vote, but because of the stoonad way Canadians vote, he adds that to other candidates and becomes Prime Minister somehow. This is what countries get for not having a two-party system.

Poilievre is the opposition party leader, and how he handles a journactivist in this viral video needs to be studied by America's opposition party. I've been wanting to see conservatives answer questions like this ever since I saw Jon Moxley do it in a WWE promo. When a journalismer starts a question with "people say..." the only response is "what people?" and "who are these people?"
